QuestData.Title: An Ancient Awakens
QuestData.Description: I slumbered in the healing silt of Hyjal.$BI slept until the world broke open.$BWhen the others came, I was not ready.$B$BI am ready now, $r.$B$BMy children and I. Slow to anger.$BBut our wrath is final.$B$BTell those who sent you that we are prepared for war.$B$BThe others will be cast from the mountain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem at the Sanctuary of Malorne in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem at the Sanctuary of Malorne in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: $n!$B$BYou were able to earn the ancient's trust?$B$BWonderful! We are one step closer to taking back this mountain...
